long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Youtube thumbnails as highquality wallpapers from each video you watch.

Simply click the extension button when watching a video. Click 'Preview' to see the image or 'Download' to copy the image to your desktop.

Please use responsibly and for personal use only. All images may be copyrighted and belong to their respective owners. By downloading and using this extension Video Wallgrab you understand these terms and cannot hold the creator liable for any unintended consequences as a result of using this extension.
